answers.answer: How far along are u?

It could just be the way the baby is laying, or possibly low fluid. But.I wouldnt worry yet, measurements taken by the tape aren't.very accurate and it's completely normal for them to be off by 2weeks in either direction because they aren't that accurate. Try and relax and just wait.and see :)
How far along are you and what's your baby measuring? My baby has been measuring 2 weeks behind since 27 weeks
I'm 30 weeks 4 days, barely measuring 27 :/ and I've been loosing weight recently as well.

When i was pregnant with my daughter who is now nearly three i was measuring four weeks behind at 36weeks and also lost two stone while pregnant  she was realy far back and only 5 pound 9 but also realy healthy and still is now.. i would try not to worry hun as not always accurate anyway :-)

I am 35 weeks measuring 33 I had a ultrasound yesterday and haven't heard anything yet other than she's measuring 33 weeks so I can't really help try more protein I'm really trying to get more protein and hoping that will help. But it could be how the baby is laying and your size I'm only 120 pounds and was 106 pre pregnancy so they did say it could be that.

I went through this with my pregnancy the last month n a half i had to get weekly growth scans n NST done because they kept saying i was measuring very small n so was my baby. I was a wreck the last month n a half cuz i din understand y i felt huge n gained tons of weight how could he b small i had my last growth scan 2 Days b4 i had my LO they said he would b smaller then 5 or might b 6lbs tops. They wanted to induce but i went into labor on my own thank god n my prince came out 8lbs 3oz i don't believe u/s are very accurate so i wouldnt worry to much im also like 5'6 with a long torso n kept telling my doc he had lots of room so of course im measuring small but he was sure that wasnt it. Hope all turns out well fa u n if you have a 5 or 6 lber thats ok baby will just b little doesn't mean he/she wont be healthy!! Good luck

I went thru the same thing and had growth scans biweekly and nsts twice s week. They were telling me my sons legs were measuring way behind along with his abdomen...I delivered him 9 days ago at 35 weeks and he was supposed to be 4 lbs and he was almost 5 and he was 18 1/2 in long with very long legs. Try not to stress about it

Yourstruly i was actually going to message you Because they are saying my baby could have a growth restriction because of my gestational diabetes and was wondering how you handled the situation and if there was any clues other than just measuring small?

I was measuring small with my little girl when I was 34 weeks I think, had an ultra sound and she was just a tiny baby. When she was born she was only 5 lb 12 oz and now she is a monster!!(: don't stress!

I have already had growth restriction with my daughter and now with my son. I also have diabetes but type 2. When you have diabetes your placenta starts to deteriate faster than a normal pregnancy. So even though your baby is getting nutrients its nit getting all of the nutrients it needs. Your baby may be small but will come out healthy. Are you seeing a specialist as well?

Right now I'm seeing a diabetes councillor every two weeks and nst twice a week just started yesterday I had a ultrasound sound and my baby's weight was estimated at 4.8 pounds. My midwife was hoping baby would have a growth spurt and since she hasn't yet she is thinking baby has a growth restriction.

Feel free to private message me if you need to talk to someone. 13 days before I had my daughter they estimated her weight at 4lbs 13ozs she was born at 4lbs 11ozs but extremely healthy. I went into labor naturally at 36weeks 5days. She was technically only 2 days premature but they still considered her a Preemie even though she was almost term. I can help you out as Mich as possible. I would talk to yours truly about hers as well. Oh yeah and my daughter also was only 17 3/4 inches long she was tiny.
Ftm I agree with missy! She helped me out a lot when I was goin through it and she was the only one I could talk to that actually knew about it and understood what I was goin thru
Glad I'm not the one and that it doesbt necessarily mean somethings wrong. I guess I'll find out tomorrow though

I m in a same boat as u r  difference is i m measuring 3 wks ahead... I have u/s today to c whats wrong... I m scared n worried... But also excited coz i hvnt seen my lil one since 20wks... I m 31wks n 1 day now... My midwife said his heartbeat is very strong 152... When she checked at 28wks his heartbeat was 141 before tht have always been 150... So hopefully everything is ok wiv him... I ll share my experirnce wiv u..
Her heartbeat was 160 today -__- but def let me know what they say at your us

Its 2:07am my u/s us at 2:30pm... I cant sleep coz of things going thru my mind. ... Lol.... My all other fundal measurements hve been on track.. But as soon as she did it yesterday day booked an emergency u/s... She is looking forward to seeing welfare of baby... She didnt tell me much or what to expect...My sister in law measured a week small from her dates but her midwife did not offer her any u/s.. She gave birth to baby girl measuring 3.3kg.. Her lebgth was not tht big... But now she is massive... Thn again my sister  inblaw herself is 4'9".... She is tiny herself n her lil girl was f9 with her height... She gave birth at 39+5wks...
I know the feeling, hope all is well with your babyyy

Hey Hun had my U/S today.. his weight is 1902g making him 4.18lb at 31 wks.. i m still on the line but on bigger size now and making him measure 33wks... but it might settle down in coming weeks... so it was growth spurt..i hope your scan goes fine.. let me know what happens? i had a lady with me today she was there for scan too but she was measuring small.. she had two boys.. and she said she always measured small in her all pregnancies but when baby comes they are fine.. she had her first son a week early and was measuring 6.6lb and second was above 7lb... so she said she is not worried about being small as she knows this baby will weigh about the same as his brothers...that could be case with you...Best of Luck...

question: So I went to the doctor today and they said I'm measuring small and I have to go back tomorrow for an ultrasound to find out why. Anyone know what it could be? I'm kinda worried :/
title: worried..
